item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: CNHI (CNH Industrial N.V.) Middle CNH’s focus on education, innovation, and customer-centric solutions positions it strategically in the agriculture and construction industries, despite potential risks associated with share buyback and delisting. PSTG (Pure Storage, Inc.) Middle Pure Storage demonstrates strong potential for growth in the data storage and financial services industry, but investors should be mindful of potential stock volatility and insider selling activity.
